1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that:The Messenger of Allah rinsed his mouth and sniffed water up into his nostrils from one scoop of water

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمَضْمَضَةِ وَالاِسْتِنْشَاقِ مِنْ كَفٍّ وَاحِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: Rinsing the mouth and sniffing up water into the nostrils with one handful of water
